the log.

c:\jdks\jdk1.4.2\bin\java -Xms100M -Xmx250M -cp startup.jar 
org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main -data c:\eclipsetestworkspaces\M5test\plugins

This looks like it's in the progress manager, unrelated to RCP.

DeferredTreeContentManager is only used currently by the CVS repositories view 
so there had to be some update going on at startup.

Kai can you give more details about your workbench?

Double checking the code there should be an isDisposed check when reusing the 
top item.

Created an attachment (id=6863)
Patch against DeferredTreeContentManager

The offending code was a workaround for Bug 42175 which is now fixed so it has 
been removed.
